mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.strategy_id AS "strategyId", a.url_type AS "urlType", a.url_context AS "urlContext", a.url_user_name AS "urlUserName", a.url_password AS "urlPassword", a.url_additional AS "urlAdditional", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM Dispatch_url a
a.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY ${orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO Dispatch_url(
id,
strategy_id,
url_type,
url_context,
url_user_name,
url_password,
url_additional,
create_date,
create_by,
update_date,
update_by,
del_flag,
remarks,
) VALUES (
#{id},
#{strategyId},
#{urlType},
#{urlContext},
#{urlUserName},
#{urlPassword},
#{urlAdditional},
#{createDate},
#{createBy},
#{updateDate},
#{updateBy},
#{delFlag},
#{remarks},
)
mapper.update:
UPDATE Dispatch_url SET
id = #{id},
strategy_id = #{strategyId},
url_type = #{urlType},
url_context = #{urlContext},
url_user_name = #{urlUserName},
url_password = #{urlPassword},
url_additional = #{urlAdditional},
create_date = #{createDate},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
update_by = #{updateBy},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
remarks = #{remarks},
WHERE id = #{id}
